keywords: Ice blocks,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Video,Raspberry,Summer,Quick & easy dessert,Stone fruit,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Mango
name: Easy Fruity Yoghurt Granola Pops Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup seed mix with pepitas & sunflower seeds

recipeInstructions.text: Place seeds, buckwheat, oats and coconut in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until lightly toasted. Remove pan from heat and stir in blueberries.
Place honey and yoghurt in a separate bowl, then stir to combine.
Fill ice block moulds with alternate layers of fruit pieces and yoghurt mixture, then press granola into yoghurt. Insert sticks and freeze for 6 hours or overnight until firm.
